overview: The Misleading Widow is a 1919 silent film comedy starring Billie Burke as Betty Taradine. It was based on the 1917 stage play Billeted by F. Tennyson Jesse and H.M. Harwood. The film was produced by Famous Players-Lasky and distributed through Paramount Pictures. It appears to be a lost film.
tagline: THERE WAS A MAN UNDER THE WIDOW'S BED, BUT IT WAS ALL RIGHTâ€”HE WAS HER HUSBAND.
title: The Misleading Widow
